thread.title: Tiger Woods commits to playing Farmers Insurance Open in January
thread.title_full: Tiger Woods commits to playing Farmers Insurance Open in January

author: Kyle Porter
title: Tiger Woods commits to playing Farmers Insurance Open in January
text:
Tiger Woods commits to playing Farmers Insurance Open in January Tiger Woods has added a second PGA Tour event to his early 2017 schedule 11m ago â€¢ 1 min read 
Tiger Woods will begin his official 2016-17 PGA Tour season at the Farmers Insurance Open at Torrey Pines later this January. Woods has won at Torrey Pines a record eight times in his career. 
"We're thrilled our fans will have the opportunity to see Tiger in addition to what is already a very strong field for the Farmers Insurance Open," said Century Club CEO Peter Ripa in a statement. 
"He has experienced tremendous success at Torrey Pines and in our tournament, and we couldn't think of a better place for him to start the year. Tiger's presence will add to a deep and talented field that includes many of the top stars in the game as well as some exciting up-and-coming players." 
Woods won this event in 1999, 2003, 2005, 2006, 2007, 2008 and 2013. He also won the U.S. Open at Torrey Pines in 2008. This will be his first appearance in 2017. He is also slated to play the Genesis Open at Riviera later in February . Woods is coming off a performance in December at the Hero World Challenge in which he led the field in birdies made with 24 .
